title: LTOF (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK LTOF
Timer of delay.
Q is FALSE, after the delay defined in PT and IN had a faling edge.

rows.Name: IN
rows.Comment: starts timer with falling edge, resets timer with rising edge

rows: time to pass, before Q is reset

rows.Name: Q
rows.Comment: is FALSE, PT seconds after IN had a falling edge

rows: elapsed time since falling edge at IN
